div.l: Nought fer fro her͗e owne bed · xᵉⁿ · fote or twelf
ThereHysThereHys doughtᵘur had a bed all by here self
div.note: Per Mosser "exʳ" is a correction mark.
div.l: Right in the same Chambre by and by
It myght be no bette and cause why
There was none romer herborowgh in the place
They soupen̄ and speken̄ of solace
And drunkyn̄ eủere stronge ale at the beste
Aboute mydnyght wente they to reste
Well hath the Miller vernysshid his hede
Full pale he was for drunkyn̄ and not rede
He yeskith and spekith thrugh the nose
As he were on̄ the quak or on̄ the pose
To bed he goth and with hym̄ his wif
As eny Iay he light was and Iolif
So was hure Ioly whistell well y wette
The Cradell at the beddis fete was sette
To rocke and to yeve the Childe soke
And whan̄ that drunken̄ was all in the Croke
To bedde wente the doughtur anon̄
To bedde goth Aleyn̄ and also Iohn
There was nomore hem̄ nedith no dwale
This Miller hath so wisely bibbed the ale
That as an̄ hors he fnorteth yn̄ his slepe
Ne of his taile behynde he toke no kepe
Hys wyf bare hym̄ a burdon̄ that was full stronge
Men̄ mygh here routyng here a furlonge
The wenche routed eke ꝑpar companye
Aleyn̄ the Clerke that herde this melodye
He poked Iohn and seide slepist thow
Herde thou eủere suche a songe er now
Lo which a couplyng is amonge hem̄ alle
A wilde fire on̄ there bodies alle
This longe nyght tide me no reste
But yit no force all shalbe for the beste
For Iohn seide he as eủere mot y thrife
Yif that y may yonder wenche woll y swife
Som̄ esement has lawe shapen̄ vs
For Iohn there is a lawe that seith thus
That yif a man̄ in on̄ poynte be agrevid
That in another shalbe relevid
